alert.note: Alert for Dodge (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 9:06PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dodge County through 915 PM CDT... At 906 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Claremont, or 8 miles east of Owatonna, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Concord, Claremont, Concord, Eden, County Roads 1 And 24, County Roads 20 And 5 and Highway 14 And County 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Minnesota.
